dc:title: On Pilgrimage - February 1959
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Tells of a failed cooperative apartment effort. Describes the mess of moving to a new house, the dust of demolition next door, the temporary stop of the bread line, and the cost of flop housing.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 749 1959-02-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
